1389340.name: Passion At All Costs - Documentary
1389340.description:
Co-Founders Alexander Mejia, and Sophie Wright sit down and talk about their journey from 2015 to 2020 making Starship Commander Arcade. Watch their journey from working on Starship Commander as a hobby project, to making their big break with Microsoft catapulting their company, Human Interact into the lime light. As publishers of VR games focused on motion controls, Starship Commander failed to raise enough money with their innovative voice dialogue systems, and were forced to make a hard choice: Release Starship Commander as an arcade only experience, or fold the company.

This film has a runtime of 52 minutes, and is DRM free.
